hóu /hou2/
1. monkey; CL: zhī
2. marquis, second of the five orders of ancient Chinese nobility »wǔděngjuéwèi«; nobleman; high official
3. throat; larynx
4. wart
5. (appears as phonetic ho, especially in words taken from Sanskrit); half-blind (archaic)
6. metal arrowhead
7. dry provisions
8. (anatomy) epiphysis
9. blowfish

Huánghè Lóu /Huang2 he4 Lou2/*
■ Yellow Crane Tower in Wuhan City, built in 223, burnt down in 1884, rebuilt in 1985; favored place of poet sages, who in legend arrived riding golden cranes; Tang poem by Cui Hao »Cuī Hào«, with theme 'the past will never return'; one of three famous pagodas in China along with Yueyang Tower »Yuèyáng Lóu« in Yueyang, north Hunan, and Tengwang Tower »Téngwáng Gé« in Nanchang, Jiangxi

huà /hua4/
1. dialect; language; spoken words; speech; talk; words; conversation; what sb said; CL: zhǒng, xí, jù,»kǒu«,»fān«
2. to draw; to paint
3. picture; painting; CL: fú, zhāng
4. to draw (a line)
5. stroke of a Chinese character
6. (calligraphy) horizontal stroke
7. to make into; to change into; -ization; to ... -ize; to transform; abbr. for »huàxué«
8. to delimit; to transfer; to assign; to plan; to draw (a line); stroke of a Chinese character
9. (botany) birch (genus Betula)
10. tranquil
11. wide; broad
12. obstinate; perverse
huà /hua4/
huàzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

2. to draw; to paint
3. picture; painting; CL: fú, zhāng

5. stroke of a Chinese character

8. to delimit; to transfer; to assign; to plan; to draw (a line); stroke of a Chinese character
9. (botany) birch (genus Betula)
10. tranquil
11. wide; broad
12. obstinate; perverse
huà /hua4/
huàguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

10. tranquil
11. wide; broad
12. obstinate; perverse
huà /hua4/
huàle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. dialect; language; spoken words; speech; talk; words; conversation; what sb said; CL: zhǒng, xí, jù,»kǒu«,»fān«
2. to draw; to paint

11. wide; broad
12. obstinate; perverse

huàn /huan4/
1. to exchange; to change (clothes etc); to substitute; to switch; to convert (currency)
2. to suffer (from illness); to contract (a disease); misfortune; trouble; danger; worry
3. fantasy
4. to call
5. (bound form) shining; glowing; lustrous
6. to wash; to rinse; any of three 10-day division of the month (during Tang dynasty); Taiwan pr. »huǎn«; also pr. »wǎn«
7. to dissipate; to dissolve
8. excellent
9. imperial official; court eunuch
10. pass through; to get into (armor)
11. soapberry (order Sapindales)
12. (of writing, pictures etc) indistinct due to deterioration (water damage etc); blurry; eroded
13. to rear; to raise (animals)
14. to tear between chariots (as punishment)
15. to escape from
16. grass carp

huànmáo /huan4 mao2/*
huànmáozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
■ to molt (of birds); to change feathers
huànmáo /huan4 mao2/*
huànmáoguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
■ to molt (of birds); to change feathers
huànmáo /huan4 mao2/*
huànmáole, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ to molt (of birds); to change feathers
huànmén /huan4 men2/*
■ family of officials; family with connections to the bureaucracy (i.e. the middle classes in imperial China)
huànmèng /huan4 meng4/*
■ fantasy; illusion; dream
huànmiè /huan4mie4/
1. (of dreams, hopes etc) to vanish; to evaporate
2. (of a person) to become disillusioned; disillusionment
huànmiè /huan4mie4/
huànmièzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

huànmiè /huan4mie4/

huī /hui1/
1. ash; dust; lime; gray; discouraged; dejected
2. to wave; to brandish; to command; to conduct; to scatter; to disperse
3. badge; emblem; insignia; crest; logo; coat of arms
4. splendor; to shine upon
5. sunshine; to shine upon
6. to restore; to recover; great
7. neigh; whinny (sound made by a horse)
8. to speak falsely or wrongly; ugly
9. to split; to direct; to brandish; humble
10. bright; glorious
11. pheasant; golden pheasant; variegated; to fly
12. sick; with no ambition
13. a queen's ceremonial gowns
14. whimsical; humorous
15. clash; grunting of pigs
16. destroy; overthrow
17. signal flag; to signal

huīfāyóu /hui1 fa1 you2/*
■ volatile oil (in general); gasoline
huīfēiyānmiè /hui1 fei1 yan1 mie4/*
■ lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom); fig. to be annihilated; to vanish in a puff of smoke
huīfù /hui1 fu4/*
■ to reinstate; to resume; to restore; to recover; to regain; to rehabilitate

huīfù /hui1 fu4/*

■ banner
Huīzhōu /Hui1zhou1/
■ Huizhou, a district of Huangshan City »Huángshān Shì«, Anhui
Huīzhōu Qū /Hui1zhou1 Qu1/
■ Huizhou, a district of Huangshan City »Huángshān Shì«, Anhui
huīzhǔ /hui1 zhu3/*
■ to brandish
huīzhǔ /hui1 zhu3/*
huīzhǔzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
■ to brandish
huīzhǔ /hui1 zhu3/*
huīzhǔguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
■ to brandish
huīzhǔ /hui1 zhu3/*
huīzhǔle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ to brandish
huī'àn /hui1 an4/*
■ dull gray; drab; murky
huí /hui2/
1. to circle; to go back; to turn around; to answer; to return; to revolve; Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims); time; classifier for acts of a play; section or chapter (of a classic book)
2. to curve; to return; to revolve
3. (bound form) fennel
4. disordered; indistinct doubtful; blurred
5. eddying; whirling (of water); to go against the current
6. roundworm; Ascaris lumbricoides
huí /hui2/
huízhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to circle; to go back; to turn around; to answer; to return; to revolve; Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims); time; classifier for acts of a play; section or chapter (of a classic book)
2. to curve; to return; to revolve
3. (bound form) fennel
4. disordered; indistinct doubtful; blurred
5. eddying; whirling (of water); to go against the current
6. roundworm; Ascaris lumbricoides
huí /hui2/
huíguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to circle; to go back; to turn around; to answer; to return; to revolve; Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims); time; classifier for acts of a play; section or chapter (of a classic book)
2. to curve; to return; to revolve
3. (bound form) fennel
4. disordered; indistinct doubtful; blurred
5. eddying; whirling (of water); to go against the current
6. roundworm; Ascaris lumbricoides
huí /hui2/
huíle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to circle; to go back; to turn around; to answer; to return; to revolve; Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims); time; classifier for acts of a play; section or chapter (of a classic book)
2. to curve; to return; to revolve
3. (bound form) fennel
4. disordered; indistinct doubtful; blurred
5. eddying; whirling (of water); to go against the current
6. roundworm; Ascaris lumbricoides

Huíhui /Hui2hui5/
■ (old) the Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims); a Hui person
huíhuí /hui2hui2/
■ time and again; every time
Huíhuí qīng /Hui2hui2 qing1/
■ Mohammedan blue (a cobalt blue pigment imported from Persia, used as an underglaze on Chinese porcelain during the Ming dynasty)

huì /hui4/
1. can; to have the skill; to know how to
2. to be likely to; to be sure to
3. to meet; to get together
4. meeting; gathering
5. (suffix) union; group; association
6. (bound form) a moment (Taiwan pr. »huǐ«)
7. to remit; to converge (of rivers); to exchange
8. class; collection
9. (bound form) act of kindness (from a superior); (honorific prefix) kind (as in »huìgù«)
10. to draw; to paint
11. to depict; to portray
12. (bound form) dirty; filthy
13. intelligent
14. beak; snout; mouth; to pant
15. to braise; to cook (rice etc) with vegetables, meat and water
16. (bound form) bribery
17. to flourish; luxuriant growth
18. to avoid mentioning; taboo word; name of deceased emperor or superior
19. (bound form) last day of a lunar month; (bound form) dark; gloomy; (literary) night
20. broom
21. to teach; to instruct; to induce
22. plants
23. shrill sound; twinkling
24. a room; the wall of a house; a man's name
25. rage
26. coffin
27. to fester; to ulcerate (old variant of »huì«)
28. vast; expansive (as of water)
29. jade ornament in the seams of cap
30. multicolor; to draw
31. noise of bird's wings
32. a general term for plants
33. Coumarouna odorata
34. (cicada); Platypleura kaempferi
35. three edged spear; (used in given names)
36. gate of market
37. (of food) rotten and smelly

huò /huo4/
1. to mix (ingredients) together; to blend; classifier for rinses of clothes; classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
2. maybe; perhaps; might; possibly; or
3. goods; money; commodity
4. (literary) to catch; to capture
5. (literary) to get; to obtain; to win
6. (bound form) to reap; to harvest
7. disaster; misfortune; calamity
8. (literary) suddenly
9. to confuse; to be puzzled
10. (onom.) expressing admiration or surprise; (onom.) sound of a laugh
11. open; clear; liberal-minded; generous
12. to exempt; to remit
13. wok (dialect); cauldron (old)
14. (interj.) oh!
15. trap
16. Lophanthus rugosus; beans
17. to twinkle; to glint
18. (literary) variant of »huò«
19. to vomit
20. (tree)
21. dashing of waves
22. cook; dashing of water
23. (literary) meat broth
24. (archaic) to measure
25. looper caterpillar
26. sound of flesh being separated from the bone
27. red earth used for paints
huò /huo4/

huòqì /huo4qi4/
■ "wok hei", a distinctive smoky, charred, and slightly caramelized flavor imparted to food cooked in a wok over a high flame (orthographic borrowing from Cantonese, Jyutping: wok6 hei3)
huòquē /huo4 que1/*
■ to lack; to do without
huòquē /huo4 que1/*
huòquēzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
■ to lack; to do without
huòquē /huo4 que1/*
huòquēguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
■ to lack; to do without
huòquē /huo4 que1/*
huòquēle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ to lack; to do without

hū /hu1/
1. to call; to cry; to shout; to breath out; to exhale
2. to shout; to call out
3. (classical particle similar to »yú«) in; at; from; because; than; (classical final particle similar to »ma«, »ba«, »ne«, expressing question, doubt or astonishment)
4. to smear; to daub; to cover (a surface with sth sticky or paste-like)
5. Taiwan pr. »hú«
6. to neglect; to overlook; to ignore; suddenly
7. to whistle (with fingers in one's mouth); (onom.) for the sound of the wind
8. arrogant; rude; to cover
9. daybreak; dawn; dusky; dim
10. to cook in a small quantity of water
11. big piece of meat; dried meat
12. (old) vaguely; suddenly
13. stripes of a tiger
14. to exhale; to call; scream of tiger
15. to shout; to mourn; to invoke
hū /hu1/
hūzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to call; to cry; to shout; to breath out; to exhale
2. to shout; to call out
3. (classical particle similar to »yú«) in; at; from; because; than; (classical final particle similar to »ma«, »ba«, »ne«, expressing question, doubt or astonishment)
4. to smear; to daub; to cover (a surface with sth sticky or paste-like)
5. Taiwan pr. »hú«
6. to neglect; to overlook; to ignore; suddenly
7. to whistle (with fingers in one's mouth); (onom.) for the sound of the wind
8. arrogant; rude; to cover
9. daybreak; dawn; dusky; dim
10. to cook in a small quantity of water
11. big piece of meat; dried meat
12. (old) vaguely; suddenly
13. stripes of a tiger
14. to exhale; to call; scream of tiger
15. to shout; to mourn; to invoke
hū /hu1/
hūguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

2. to shout; to call out
3. (classical particle similar to »yú«) in; at; from; because; than; (classical final particle similar to »ma«, »ba«, »ne«, expressing question, doubt or astonishment)
4. to smear; to daub; to cover (a surface with sth sticky or paste-like)

6. to neglect; to overlook; to ignore; suddenly
7. to whistle (with fingers in one's mouth); (onom.) for the sound of the wind
8. arrogant; rude; to cover
9. daybreak; dawn; dusky; dim
10. to cook in a small quantity of water
11. big piece of meat; dried meat
12. (old) vaguely; suddenly
13. stripes of a tiger
14. to exhale; to call; scream of tiger
15. to shout; to mourn; to invoke
hū /hu1/
hūle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to call; to cry; to shout; to breath out; to exhale
2. to shout; to call out
3. (classical particle similar to »yú«) in; at; from; because; than; (classical final particle similar to »ma«, »ba«, »ne«, expressing question, doubt or astonishment)
4. to smear; to daub; to cover (a surface with sth sticky or paste-like)
5. Taiwan pr. »hú«
6. to neglect; to overlook; to ignore; suddenly
7. to whistle (with fingers in one's mouth); (onom.) for the sound of the wind

9. daybreak; dawn; dusky; dim

11. big piece of meat; dried meat
12. (old) vaguely; suddenly
13. stripes of a tiger
14. to exhale; to call; scream of tiger
15. to shout; to mourn; to invoke

hūn /hun1/
1. to marry; marriage; wedding; to take a wife
2. muddle-headed; twilight; to faint; to lose consciousness
3. strong-smelling vegetable (garlic etc); non-vegetarian food (meat, fish etc); vulgar; obscene
4. confused; forgetful; silly
5. to die by taking poison
6. gloomy; depressed
7. doorkeeper
hūn /hun1/
hūnzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to marry; marriage; wedding; to take a wife
2. muddle-headed; twilight; to faint; to lose consciousness
3. strong-smelling vegetable (garlic etc); non-vegetarian food (meat, fish etc); vulgar; obscene
4. confused; forgetful; silly
5. to die by taking poison
6. gloomy; depressed
7. doorkeeper
hūn /hun1/
hūnguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to marry; marriage; wedding; to take a wife
2. muddle-headed; twilight; to faint; to lose consciousness
3. strong-smelling vegetable (garlic etc); non-vegetarian food (meat, fish etc); vulgar; obscene
4. confused; forgetful; silly
5. to die by taking poison
6. gloomy; depressed
7. doorkeeper
hūn /hun1/
hūnle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to marry; marriage; wedding; to take a wife
2. muddle-headed; twilight; to faint; to lose consciousness
3. strong-smelling vegetable (garlic etc); non-vegetarian food (meat, fish etc); vulgar; obscene
4. confused; forgetful; silly

hú /hu2/
1. to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
2. lake; CL: gè, piàn
3. non-Han people, esp. from central Asia; reckless; outrageous; what?; why?; to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written »hú«)
4. beard; mustache; whiskers
5. pot; classifier for bottled liquid
6. to paste; to glue
7. blurry; unclear; muddled
8. (esp. of food) scorched; burnt
9. paste; mush; thick gruel
10. congee; (in »húkǒu«) to feed oneself
11. fox
12. arc
13. Mongolian oak (Quercus dentata); see also »húshù«
14. (used in female names) (old)
15. to dig; to mix
16. ancient measuring vessel; fifty liters; dry measure for grain equal to five dou (before Tang, ten pecks)
17. burnt; to char
18. (arch.) precious stone
19. fine silk gauze
20. ancient measuring vessel (same as ); frightened
21. swan
22. pelican
23. falcon; migratory bird

Hù Shēn Gǎng /Hu4 Shen1 Gang3/*
■ abbr. for Shanghai »Shànghǎi«, Shenzhen »Shēnzhèn« and Hong Kong »Xiānggǎng«
jiā /jia1/
1. home; family; (polite) my (sister, uncle etc); classifier for families or businesses; refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China; noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian
2. to add; (math.) plus; to increase; to augment; (used before a disyllabic verb, often after an adverb like »bù«, »dà«, »shāo« etc, to indicate that the action applies to sth previously mentioned, as in »shāojiāgǎiliáng« "make some minor improvements to (it)")
3. to press from either side; to place in between; to sandwich; to carry sth under armpit; wedged between; between; to intersperse; to mix; to mingle; clip; folder; Taiwan pr. »jiá«
4. beautiful; fine; good
5. traditionally used as phonetic for "ga"
6. gamma; jewelry
7. excellent; auspicious; to praise; to commend
8. phonetic character used in loanwords for the sound "jia", although »jiá« is more common
9. (phonetic sound for Buddhist terms)
10. cangue (wooden collar like stocks used to restrain and punish criminals in China)
11. scab
12. gallium (chemistry)
13. whistle made of reed
14. (old) chopsticks; Taiwan pr. »jiá«
15. soaked; to wet; to drench; Taiwan pr. »jiá«
16. mythical ape
17. flail (for threshing grain)
18. reed; Phragmites communis
19. boar; male pig
20. to sit cross-legged
21. buck; stag
jiā /jia1/
jiāzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. home; family; (polite) my (sister, uncle etc); classifier for families or businesses; refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China; noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian

jiān /jian1/
1. between; among; within a definite time or space; room; section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars; classifier for rooms
2. pointed; tapering; sharp
3. (of a sound) shrill; piercing
4. (of one's hearing, sight etc) sharp; acute; keen
5. to make (one's voice) shrill
6. sharp point; tip
7. the best of sth; the cream of the crop
8. double; twice; simultaneous; holding two or more (official) posts at the same time
9. shoulder; to shoulder (responsibilities etc)
10. to pan fry; to sauté
11. sound of moving water
12. strong; solid; firm; unyielding; resolute
13. to imbue
14. wicked; crafty; traitor
15. to fornicate; to defile; adultery; rape
16. to supervise; to inspect; jail; prison
17. (wooden) box; cup; letter
18. letters; to close; to seal
19. letter; note-paper
20. difficult; hard; hardship
21. to annihilate; abbr. for »jiānjījī«, fighter plane
22. bonito
23. to pick up with chopsticks
24. (grass); Themeda forsbali
25. narrow; small
26. shear
27. to wash; to redress (a wrong); name of a river
28. to extinguish (of fire)
29. bullock; castrated bull; to castrate livestock
30. thick waterproof silk
31. Althaea rosea
32. reed
33. Eupatorium chinensis
34. orchid (same as ); Eupatorium (same as )
35. fully grown pig; 3-year old pig
36. awl; sharp iron point
37. see »Líjiān«, Han dynasty name for countries in far West
38. a quiver on a horse; a store
39. (bound form) saddle blanket
40. to hang down (hair)
41. flounder; flatfish
42. mythical bird with one eye and one wing; see also »diéjiān«
jiān /jian1/
jiānzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

1. rivers and lakes
2. all corners of the country; remote areas to which hermits retreat
3. section of society operating independently of mainstream society, out of reach of the law; the milieu in which wuxia tales play out (cf. »wǔxiá«)

jiāo /jiao1/
1. to teach; to instruct
2. to hand over; to deliver; to pay (money); to turn over
3. to make friends
4. (of lines) to intersect
5. burnt; scorched; charred; worried; anxious; coke; joule (abbr. for »jiāoěr«)
6. to glue; glue; gum; rubber
7. to pour liquid; to irrigate (using waterwheel); to water; to cast (molten metal); to mold

23. kind of cicada, cosmopsaltria
24. a kind of aquatic bird
25. eastern wren

■ (of two or more things) to occur at the same time; to be mingled; to accompany each other

2. to splice; a glued joint; a bond

2. to borrow
3. first of the ten Heavenly Stems »shítiāngān«; (used for an unspecified person or thing); first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc); letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc; armor plating; shell or carapace; (of the fingers or toes) nail; bladed leather or metal armor (old); ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old); civil administration unit in the baojia »bǎojiǎ« system (old); ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

12. obstruction in the intestine
13. shoulder blade

jiǎn /jian3/
1. to pick up; to collect; to gather
2. (bound form) scissors or similar tool; to cut as with scissors; (bound form) to wipe out; to exterminate; to edit (video, audio etc)
3. to check; to examine; to inspect; to exercise restraint
4. to lower; to decrease; to reduce; to subtract; to diminish
5. simple; uncomplicated; letter; to choose; to select; bamboo strips used for writing (old)
6. to choose; to pick; to sort out; to pick up
7. (bound form) cocoon; (bound form) callus
8. (chemistry) base; alkali; soda
9. (bound form) frugal; thrifty
10. card; note; letter
11. eyelid
12. (dialect) fold or pleat (in clothing)
13. child
14. carry to the utmost; to cut
15. bright (light)
16. bamboo conduit; wooden peg; spout; same as
17. bamboo conduit; water pipe of bamboo
18. to speak out boldly
19. shallow; superficial
20. (bound form) callus
21. lame; cripple; unfortunate; slow; difficult; nag (inferior horse); donkey; lame horse
22. ancient weapon like a long solid metal truncheon

1. to alleviate a burden on sb
2. lacking in knowledge; ignorant
jiǎng /jiang3/
1. to speak; to explain; to negotiate; to emphasize; to be particular about; as far as sth is concerned; speech; lecture
2. prize; award; bonus; reward
3. (bound form) to encourage; to commend; to praise
4. to award; to give as a reward
5. oar; paddle; CL: zhī
6. (dialect) hill
7. to plow; to sow
8. (bound form) callus
9. honest; upright
jiǎng /jiang3/
jiǎngzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to speak; to explain; to negotiate; to emphasize; to be particular about; as far as sth is concerned; speech; lecture
2. prize; award; bonus; reward
3. (bound form) to encourage; to commend; to praise
4. to award; to give as a reward
5. oar; paddle; CL: zhī
6. (dialect) hill
7. to plow; to sow
8. (bound form) callus
9. honest; upright
jiǎng /jiang3/
jiǎngguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to speak; to explain; to negotiate; to emphasize; to be particular about; as far as sth is concerned; speech; lecture
2. prize; award; bonus; reward
3. (bound form) to encourage; to commend; to praise
4. to award; to give as a reward
5. oar; paddle; CL: zhī
6. (dialect) hill
7. to plow; to sow
8. (bound form) callus
9. honest; upright
jiǎng /jiang3/
jiǎngle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

9. honest; upright

jiǎo /jiao3/
1. foot; leg (of an animal or an object); base (of an object); CL: shuāng, zhī
2. classifier for kicks
3. angle; corner; horn; horn-shaped; unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)
4. to disturb; to annoy; to mix; to stir
5. to hand in; to hand over; to pay
6. to capture (weapons); to seize
7. to twist (strands into a thread); to entangle; to wring; to hang (by the neck); to turn; to wind; classifier for skeins of yarn
8. to correct; to rectify; to redress; strong; brave; to pretend; to feign; affectation
9. dumplings with meat filling
10. to destroy; to extirpate
11. scissors; to cut (with scissors)

jià /jia4/
1. vacation
2. to support; frame; rack; framework; classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc
3. (of a woman) to marry; to marry off a daughter; to shift (blame etc)
4. price; value; (chemistry) valence
5. to harness; to draw (a cart etc); to drive; to pilot; to sail; to ride; your good self; prefixed word denoting respect (polite »jìngcí«)
6. cloth (archaic), esp. of southern ethnic groups
7. to sow grain; (farm) crop
jià /jia4/
jiàzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. vacation
2. to support; frame; rack; framework; classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc
3. (of a woman) to marry; to marry off a daughter; to shift (blame etc)
4. price; value; (chemistry) valence
5. to harness; to draw (a cart etc); to drive; to pilot; to sail; to ride; your good self; prefixed word denoting respect (polite »jìngcí«)
6. cloth (archaic), esp. of southern ethnic groups
7. to sow grain; (farm) crop
jià /jia4/
jiàguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. vacation
2. to support; frame; rack; framework; classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc
3. (of a woman) to marry; to marry off a daughter; to shift (blame etc)
4. price; value; (chemistry) valence
5. to harness; to draw (a cart etc); to drive; to pilot; to sail; to ride; your good self; prefixed word denoting respect (polite »jìngcí«)
6. cloth (archaic), esp. of southern ethnic groups
7. to sow grain; (farm) crop
jià /jia4/
jiàle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

2. to support; frame; rack; framework; classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc
3. (of a woman) to marry; to marry off a daughter; to shift (blame etc)
4. price; value; (chemistry) valence
5. to harness; to draw (a cart etc); to drive; to pilot; to sail; to ride; your good self; prefixed word denoting respect (polite »jìngcí«)
6. cloth (archaic), esp. of southern ethnic groups
7. to sow grain; (farm) crop

jiàn /jian4/
1. to see; to meet; to appear (to be sth); to interview; opinion; view
2. item; component; classifier for events, things, clothes etc
3. gap; to separate; to thin out (seedlings); to sow discontent
4. to establish; to found; to set up; to build; to construct
5. double-edged sword; CL: kǒu, bǎ
6. classifier for blows of a sword
7. inexpensive; lowly; despicable; (bound form) (humble) my
8. key (on a piano or computer keyboard); button (on a mouse or other device); chemical bond; linchpin
9. to splash
10. arrow; CL: zhī
11. healthy; to invigorate; to strengthen; to be good at; to be strong in
12. bronze mirror (used in ancient times); to reflect; to mirror; sth that serves as a warning or a lesson; to examine; to scrutinize
13. gradual; gradually
14. warship
15. (bound form) supervisor; supervisory office (in imperial China)
16. to fulfill (a promise); to tread; to walk
17. tendon; sinew
18. (bound form) to overstep one's authority
19. banister; balustrade; cage for animal or prisoner; to transport caged prisoner on a cart
20. to recommend; to offer sacrifice (arch.); grass; straw mat
21. to remonstrate; to admonish
22. farewell dinner; preserves
23. short; shallow; thin plate
24. to overstep one's authority; to usurp
25. fence; palisade
26. material (such as rocks, earth, bamboo etc) used to hastily repair a dike; (literary) door bar (vertical bar used to prevent the horizontal movement of a door bolt)
27. shuttlecock
28. flowing water; successive
29. mountain stream
30. to arrive (of water)
31. to prop up
32. (jade)
33. to spy

jiàng /jiang4/
1. (bound form) a general; (literary) to command; to lead; (Chinese chess) general (on the black side, equivalent to a king in Western chess)
2. stubborn; unyielding
3. to drop; to fall; to come down; to descend
4. thick paste of fermented soybean; marinated in soy paste; paste; jam
5. craftsman
6. purple-red
7. snare; to snare
8. flood
9. (of soup, paste etc) thick
jiàng /jiang4/
jiàngzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. (bound form) a general; (literary) to command; to lead; (Chinese chess) general (on the black side, equivalent to a king in Western chess)
2. stubborn; unyielding
3. to drop; to fall; to come down; to descend
4. thick paste of fermented soybean; marinated in soy paste; paste; jam
5. craftsman
6. purple-red
7. snare; to snare
8. flood
9. (of soup, paste etc) thick
jiàng /jiang4/
jiàngguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. (bound form) a general; (literary) to command; to lead; (Chinese chess) general (on the black side, equivalent to a king in Western chess)
2. stubborn; unyielding
3. to drop; to fall; to come down; to descend
4. thick paste of fermented soybean; marinated in soy paste; paste; jam
5. craftsman
6. purple-red
7. snare; to snare
8. flood
9. (of soup, paste etc) thick
jiàng /jiang4/
jiàngle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. (bound form) a general; (literary) to command; to lead; (Chinese chess) general (on the black side, equivalent to a king in Western chess)
2. stubborn; unyielding
3. to drop; to fall; to come down; to descend
4. thick paste of fermented soybean; marinated in soy paste; paste; jam
5. craftsman
6. purple-red
7. snare; to snare
8. flood
9. (of soup, paste etc) thick
Jiàng /Jiang4/
■ capital of the Jin State during the Spring and Autumn Period (770-475 BC)

jiào /jiao4/
1. to shout; to call; to order; to ask; to be called; by (indicates agent in the passive mood)
2. (bound form) to teach; to instruct
3. a religion
4. to cause (sb to do sth); to tell (sb to do sth)
5. a nap; a sleep; CL: cháng
6. to check; to collate; to proofread
7. (bound form) to compare

9. compared to

11. also pr. »jiǎo«

3. to collate and annotate; (on book titles) collated and annotated

jià'èrlángtuǐzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
■ to stick one leg over the other (when sitting)

jià'èrlángtuǐ /jia4 er4 lang2 tui3/*

■ to stick one leg over the other (when sitting)
jie /jie5/
■ particle used between an adverb and a verb or adjective; (dialect) particle used after a negative adverb such as »bù« or »bié« without any other following element
jiē /jie1/
1. to receive; to answer (the phone); to meet or welcome sb; to connect; to catch; to join; to extend; to take one's turn on duty; to take over for sb
2. street; CL: tiáo
3. (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds); Taiwan pr. »jié«
4. all; each and every; in all cases
5. to take the lid off; to expose; to unmask
6. rank or step; stairs
7. pimple; sore; boil; Taiwan pr. »jié«
8. sigh; also pr. »juē«
9. Chinese pistachio tree (Pistacia chinensis)
10. grain stalks left after threshing
11. harmonious (of music)
12. (archaic) to graft (a branch, bud etc)
13. flowing (of water)
14. (archaic) tertian malaria
jiē /jie1/
jiēguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to receive; to answer (the phone); to meet or welcome sb; to connect; to catch; to join; to extend; to take one's turn on duty; to take over for sb
2. street; CL: tiáo
3. (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds); Taiwan pr. »jié«
4. all; each and every; in all cases
5. to take the lid off; to expose; to unmask
6. rank or step; stairs
7. pimple; sore; boil; Taiwan pr. »jié«
8. sigh; also pr. »juē«
9. Chinese pistachio tree (Pistacia chinensis)
10. grain stalks left after threshing
11. harmonious (of music)
12. (archaic) to graft (a branch, bud etc)
13. flowing (of water)
14. (archaic) tertian malaria
jiē /jie1/
jiēle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to receive; to answer (the phone); to meet or welcome sb; to connect; to catch; to join; to extend; to take one's turn on duty; to take over for sb
2. street; CL: tiáo
3. (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds); Taiwan pr. »jié«
4. all; each and every; in all cases
5. to take the lid off; to expose; to unmask
6. rank or step; stairs
7. pimple; sore; boil; Taiwan pr. »jié«
8. sigh; also pr. »juē«
9. Chinese pistachio tree (Pistacia chinensis)
10. grain stalks left after threshing
11. harmonious (of music)
12. (archaic) to graft (a branch, bud etc)
13. flowing (of water)
14. (archaic) tertian malaria

jié /jie2/
1. knot; sturdy; bond; to tie; to bind; to check out (of a hotel)
2. joint; node
3. (bound form) section; segment
4. solar term (one of the 24 divisions of the year in the traditional Chinese calendar)
5. seasonal festival
6. (bound form) to economize; to save
7. (bound form) moral integrity; chastity
8. classifier for segments: lessons, train wagons, biblical verses etc
9. knot (nautical miles per hour)
10. to rob; to plunder; to seize by force; to coerce; calamity; abbr. for kalpa »jiébō«
11. (bound form) hero; heroic; outstanding person; prominent; distinguished
12. to cut off (a length); to stop; to intercept; section; chunk; length
13. clean
14. quick; nimble
15. victory; triumph; quick; nimble; prompt
16. to exhaust
17. ram, esp. gelded; to castrate; deer's skin
18. (emperor of Xia dynasty); cruel
19. antagonistic; laboring hard; pressed
20. to accuse; to pry
21. handsome
22. forceful; martial
23. careful; diligent; firm
24. box (dialect); used to transliterate words with sounds kip-, cap- etc
25. (literary) lonely; all alone
26. (literary) few; a couple of
27. mountain peak
28. wipe
29. a peg; tally; score
30. a stump on which chickens roost
31. eyelashes
32. stone tablet
33. to join; to splice; to braid
34. beetle
35. small green cicada
36. lift up a dress
37. (bound form) to question closely; to interrogate
38. oyster
jié /jie2/
